text:
Is there any update on being able to add styles to the head for custom modules?

My Colleague has built a really nice set of custom modules tailored for a client, that you can just drop in to dnd templates and set all the options in the modules, the only issue is we need to add some media queries to make them responsive but it appears weâ€™re not allowed to for some reason?? This seems like a very big limitation, which should be able to be very easily solved
